content: This article includes a list of general references, but **it lacks sufficient corresponding inline citations**. Please help to improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(October 2011)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*This article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "List of arts and entertainment venues in Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar
